Key Match Events: Kvaratskhelia (33' pen.), Chakvetadze (53'), Mikautadze (63'), Kochorashvili (66') scored for Georgia
Coufal (16'), Kral (38'), Krejci (81') received red cards for Czech Republic
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Georgia to win based on their recent form
Willy Sagnol emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
Georgia's home record bodes well ahead of the match
Ivan Hasek's side will be hoping to improve their away form
Post-Match Reflections: Willy Sagnol praised his team's performance and said they are on the right track
Ivan Hasek said his team was disappointed with the result and will regroup for the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Mikheil Meskhi Stadium in Tbilisi
The weather conditions were not mentioned in the article
The match was a part of the UEFA Nations League 2024-25
Others: Georgia and Czech Republic are in action for the first time since competing in the same group at Euro 2024
Both nations are seeking to gain promotion from League B Group 1 along with Ukraine and Albania
